text:
Thank you for the meal...
Thanks, Kogane-chan...

Ah, I'm stuffed.
Everything was delicious...!

I also...
want to do something in return for you, Kogane-chan...

Hey, how about we all cook together?
Hehe, what do you think would be good...?

I want to
try frying something.

We can all bring ingredients together...!
Like this... put them in a basket.

Wow...
Hehe... it's like a treasure chest...â™ª

Kogane's champon is so tasty...
Do you have any secrets or tips?

Hehe, it's our family's specialty dish!
I'll tell you everything, so be prepared~!

Hehe... the freshly fried ones, crispy and hot...
Crunchy...

Yeah, crispy and hot~!
Freshly fried is the best, isn't it~!
